alert.note: Alert for Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Warren and northwestern Halifax Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Littleton, or 14 miles northeast of Warrenton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 40 mph to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Littleton, Weldon, Rosemary, Lake Gaston, Southpointe And Morningstar Marinas and Roanoke Rapids Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
